Name: 东方幻灵录 ~ Touhou Hakanai Cards
About the game: '东方幻灵录' is a strategy game combining TCG. The card characters are all from the Oriental project. You can use these different styles and distinctive characters to match a variety of lineup combinations. Enjoy well-designed balance and a fun-filled sense of operation, carefully plan the resources in the game, and use beautifully illustrated character cards to play against! It can also support 2-4 people on the PC platform for online battles ~ ---- Strategy and Europe Each round randomly refreshes different decks. By using different quality hero cards for battle, you can create your own unique genre. When you are at a disadvantage, refresh the decks you need to turn over against the wind. ---- Comparing the computing power of economic operations Whether you save money to earn interest, or spend all your money, the calculation of maximizing income is always the greatest fun of strategy games. You with different personalities will definitely come out of different routines and genres. ---- Simple and easy to use control experience The easy-to-understand gameplay can be easily managed, and for the problem of novice novices, the AI ??algorithm intelligently compensates for operational errors, making it easy for players who have not experienced self-moving chess to get started!
